Welcome.intro: As I am curious and very interested in computers, I have decided to study development at Villetaneuse since September 2023. I am currently working toward a
Welcome.butInformatique: A three-year academic program in France. It covers topics such as algorithms, databases, and software development.

Traits.eagerDescription: Enthusiastic to continuously improve my skills, I dedicate myself to doing my absolute best when facing challenges, and I see them as opportunities to learn more.
Traits.drivenDescription: I deeply enjoy coding, to the extent that I can spend multiple hours, without even realizing it, to explore a new tool.
Traits.curiousDescription: Everything in IT is interesting for me, so I am always seeking to learn more about it. That is why I have an important knowledge of multiple subjects.

First.name: Hosting machine setup
First.description: My friends and I wanted to play together but renting servers would be inefficient and cost expensive. So, I turned a friend's spare laptop into a machine that could host multiple game servers simultaneously.

Second.name: Algorithms comparisons
Second.description: This project has been made in University and it was divised in two parts. I coded 3 ways to calculate the shortest route between multiple cities. Then, I compared them to find out which is the fastest and why.
